message.body: Ok so I'm teaching this morning then im leaving town.

I'm going to my parents and will park at our neighbors since they are away. The roof of my building "collapsed" 2 floors up and I can't park behind the building until further notice or on the street due to the ban. I'll come back Monday night hopefully.
Lastly I'm going to online date. I'm really tired of being single. I am independent and capable but I want to have some dates
I hit my breaking point this week
Also I'm considering PhDs again
Lol life crisis.
Now that I made decisions I feel better'n
How was your class?
Mine was good!
oh mine was good... went by really quickly
i think all this stuff sounds good
when are you leaving?
I just left MIT
driving home?
Yes away from the chaos
I pushed my furniture into the middle of my apartment increase the leak continues which seems likely
It's all good.
I need to remain positive
It's out of my control
Sofie you. Need to fill me in on the Jeff Chris thing lol
Nosey I admit!!
oh yes yes yes... sorry I’m helping angie print something
i was going to see if you wanted to go see 50 shades of grey with us later... but yes lets talk tonight
Well I'll be gone. If I had a place to park and live then yes
Sadly I do not
Even with the money I pay lol
I really want to see it
I'll go another time!!

“Cris S: So I think Jeff stood me up This has never happened to me before Yeah he got here and dumped me Said the chemistry wasn't there Sofie Elana Hodara: I’m so sorry cris. that is such a surprise! You must have felt blind sighted Cris S: Yeah I'm completely shocked. I thought he really liked me but he said there was just something missing I wish he wouldn't have told me he liked me and saw potential for something right before sleeping with me. Sofie Elana Hodara: i know that feels really bad but if there is any consolation i really believe he meant it Cris S: Maybe. But we don't talk for a week then he tells me he only sees me as a friend? I mean I sleep with someone a few times before chalking it up to lack of chemistry 40 minutes late doesn't even apologizes, just says there's no chemistry then leaves I'm so disappointed in him. We could've talked the next day or something He really broke my heart Damn man I want to send him a final letter or something. But it'll do no good. I feel like he was so nervous but so into me, that nervousness seeped into our sex, but it's too late now. Whatever, I can't believe he acted like this. Right before this he kissed me deeply and said he was leaving for a week but to not assume he was disappearing. I tried trusting him but that's exactly what happened. I totally regret not asking him if there was anyone else”
this is the cris convo
i will sum it up for you later but in case you want to read it... its ridic and boring,,, like here
*her
My team is playing tonight
It's the first time ever I have missed the cornell Harvard game :(
But it's ok. Sofie there is a 4 x8 four whole in my buildings roof
They are going to fix it tomorrow!
The Chris thing is funny
I miss you girls
I wish I could have hung out tonight
I'm sorry I've been so grumpy. It will get better now. I think the worst is over
I really do
I just can't believe our roof collapsed!!
Will you meet with Armen Monday?
I have a good feeling about this.
Ok my turn ... I hope your not bad at me :/
Oh I'm in movie!!! Of course not.
